roleset.name: think, assume
roleset.note: SUPPOSE-V NOTES: Member of VN class consider-29.9-2. (from suppose.01-v)

role.descr: Attributive, how arg1 is thought about

example.name: imperative
example.text: *trace* Suppose an investor wants to sell a stock, but not for less than $55.
example.arg: an investor wants to sell a stock, but not for less than $55

example.name: missing (or inconvenient) thought
example.text: He thinks the underlying inflation rate is around 5% to 6%, far higher than most people suppose.

roleset.name: s'pos'ta
roleset.note: SUPPOSE-V NOTES: This is by far the most common usage. (from suppose.02-v)
SUPPOSED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from supposed.02-j)

example.name: almost modal
example.text: Market makers are supposed to keep supplies of stocks on hand to maintain orderly trading when imbalances occur.
example.arg: to keep supplies of stocks on hand to maintain orderly trading when imbalances occur
